snippet.title: ABEL - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
ABEL is a student project

Unsettled by a strange call on the intercom, our protagonist hastily takes the elevator down. When the doors open, he realizes he is not where he should be. An uncanny, strange yet familiar place lies before him.

ABEL leans towards the walking sim genre. 
Its first person perspective allows to immerse players in both real and liminal spaces, 
mental creations of Carl, our protagonist, in an introspective journey to overcome guilt and mourning.

DOWNLOAD LINK:
https://itsmetwn.itch.io/abel


Taslim GUERROUMI --- Programmer & Tech Artist
Yann KUKOLEWSKY --- Game Artist
Louis GUILLAUMEAU --- Sound Designer
Zoé (Stéphanie) SEMPÉ --- Game & Narrative Designer
Antoine BROUSSE --- Producer
With the voice of Yann GUILLEMOT

Korean version by Théophile LAUSEIG & Yujin OH (오유진)
